mapper.select: SELECT id, name, price, description, stock_quantity, category, manufacturer_id, discount, image_url, status FROM products WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name, price, description, stock_quantity, category, manufacturer_id, discount, image_url, status FROM products WHERE status = '1'

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, p.description, p.stock_quantity, p.category, c.name as manufacturer_nm, c.id as manufacturer_id, p.discount, p.image_url, p.status FROM products p LEFT JOIN company c on c.id = p.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Products ( name, price, description, stock_quantity, category, manufacturer_id, discount, status ) values ( #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{stock_quantity}, #{category}, #{manufacturer_id}, #{discount}, 0 )
